Due to construction on our district office in Washington, PA, the office will be closed tomorrow, Monday 8/19. We will still be available via phone at (724) 206-4800, and our office in Westmoreland County will remain open. Please call with any questions.

We must stand in solidarity with those fighting for freedom and democracy as the Chinese Communist Party amasses troops on the border of #HongKong. This authoritarian regime has no place challenging the autonomy of #HongKong and threatening its people.

Despite construction on the front entrance of our district office in Washington, PA, please be aware that we are open and ready to serve the constituents of the 14th district. Please enter the Trust Building to access our office. Call (724) 206-4800 with any questions.
